Parameters: String: Format specifier which does not have a corresponding argument
MissingFormatArgumentException(java.lang.Description: Constructs an instance of this class with the unmatched format specifier.

ClassDesc: Unchecked exception thrown when there is a format specifier which does not have a corresponding argument or if an argument index refers to an argument that does not exist. Unless otherwise specified, passing a @B_java#lang#NullPointerException_E@ to be thrown.
